data.title: Syphilis
data.meta_description: Syphilis is a sexually transmitted infection (STI) caused by Treponema pallidum subsp. pallidum. The incidence of syphilis was greatly reduced after the introduction of penicillin in 1943. However, after reaching an all-time nadir in the late 1990s, syphilis...
